en.html: Welcome. You are about to begin the TED Tutor.
en.text: Welcome. You are about to begin the TED Tutor.

en.html: With it, you will learn a procedure for how to design good science experiments.
en.text: With it, you will learn a procedure for how to design good science experiments.

en.html: This procedure is called the control of variables strategy or vary one thing at a time.
en.text: This procedure is called the control of variables strategy or vary one thing at a time.

en.html: TED is a computer tutor. Like a real teacher, TED provides instruction and feedback.
en.text: TED is a computer tutor. Like a real teacher, TED provides instruction and feedback.

en.html: Also like a real teacher, TED looks at your answers to see how well you are learning how to design good experiments.
en.text: Also like a real teacher, TED looks at your answers to see how well you are learning how to design good experiments.

en.html: If you answer TED's questions correctly, it will assume that you have learned the material and are ready to advance.
en.text: If you answer TED's questions correctly, it will assume that you have learned the material and are ready to advance.

en.html: If you answered TED's questions incorrectly, it will assume that you need extra help and more practice.
en.text: If you answered TED's questions incorrectly, it will assume that you need extra help and more practice.

en.html: You will move through TED's instruction at your own pace.
en.text: You will move through TED's instruction at your own pace.

en.html: You may find that sometimes you go backwards and repeat questions.
en.text: You may find that sometimes you go backwards and repeat questions.

en.html: This is because TED has determined, based on your answers, that you need more practice before you can move forward.
en.text: This is because TED has determined, based on your answers, that you need more practice before you can move forward.

en.html: The only way for TED to know how much you are learning is through your answers to its questions.
en.text: The only way for TED to know how much you are learning is through your answers to its questions.

en.html: For this reason, it's important to make sure you understand what each question is asking and to answer carefully.
en.text: For this reason, it's important to make sure you understand what each question is asking and to answer carefully.

en.html: Please use this time to adjust your volume to a comfortable level. If your volume is at a good level, click on the circle then on the triangle to begin.
en.text: Please use this time to adjust your volume to a comfortable level. If your volume is at a good level, click on the circle then on the triangle to begin.
